Ted Danson ( George ) and Mary Steenburgen ( Clem ) star in this romantic drama about a couple who after many years of marriage , is on the verge of a divorce . After two years delaying action , George Clem and take a trip to discuss the details of the separation . The trip , which starts in a friendly tone , it soon becomes a sacrifice for both, but all this is in the background when you suffer an accident and are trapped on a desert place over an unforgiving snowstorm. The struggle to survive in such a lethal environment leads the couple to come together and rediscover old emotions .
